chapters.title: Prologue: The First Sparks Fall
chapters.info: Mazrim Taim, p. 14—False Dragon who wreaked havoc in Saldaea before being captured by Aes Sedai. He later escaped his captors, possibly with Black Ajah assistance. It is believed that Davram Bashere may have dispatched his army to look for Taim. Taim is very strong in the One Power, almost as strong as Rand. See also Dragon Reborn.
